Title: Two Brothers
Writer: Alain Godard (scenario), Jean-Jacques Annaud (scenario), Jean-Jacques Annaud (original idea), Julian Fellowes (english dialogue)
Actors: Guy Pearce, Jean-Claude Dreyfus, Freddie Highmore, Oanh Nguyen
Plot: Two tigers are separated as cubs and taken into captivity, only to be reunited years later as enemies by an explorer (Pearce) who inadvertently forces them to fight each other.
